LanguageData.Chicken.label: sicín
LanguageData.Chicken.description: Coinnítear sicíní dá n-uibheacha agus dá bhfeoil. Fásann siad go tapa, agus beireann siad uibheacha gach lá.
LanguageData.Chicken.tools.claws.label: crúba
LanguageData.Chicken.tools.beak.label: gob
LanguageData.Chicken.tools.head.label: ceann
LanguageData.Duck.label: lacha
LanguageData.Duck.description: Is minic go gcoinnítear lachain dá bhfeoil. Fásann siad go tapa, ach ní bheireann siad uibheacha chomh minic le héin eile.
LanguageData.Duck.tools.claws.label: crúba
LanguageData.Duck.tools.beak.label: gob
LanguageData.Duck.tools.head.label: ceann
LanguageData.Goose.label: gé
LanguageData.Goose.description: Coinnítear na héin seo dá n-uibheacha agus dá bhfeoil. Beireann siad uibheacha gach lá.
LanguageData.Goose.tools.claws.label: crúba
LanguageData.Goose.tools.beak.label: gob
LanguageData.Goose.tools.head.label: ceann
LanguageData.Turkey.label: turcaí
LanguageData.Turkey.description: Tá cáil ar an eán ramhar seo, agus tá siad an-bhlasta.
LanguageData.Turkey.tools.claws.label: crúba
LanguageData.Turkey.tools.beak.label: gob
LanguageData.Turkey.tools.head.label: ceann
